episodes.title: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor & Peter Mandelson will never recover from Epstein Files | Andrew Neil
episodes.description:
"They will see out their days in sackcloth and ashes."

The most recent Epstein Files release reveals details which make things even worse for Peter Mandelson or Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, says Times Radio presenter Andrew Neil.

Andrew has always denied wrongdoing, and previously settled a civil claim out of court that had been brought against him by the Epstein ­victim Virginia Giuffre. 

Lord Mandelson says he regrets knowing Jeffrey Epstein, but also says he has no record or recollection of receiving $75,000 from the paedophile financier.
